title: SOLD: 1882 NY Clipper Wooduct - Buck Ewing HOF (BGS Authentic)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1882 NY Clipper Wooduct - Buck Ewing HOF (BGS Authentic)
posts.post_content:
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is an extremely rare 1882 New York Clipper Woodcut picturing HOF'er, Buck Ewing and authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. This is the EARLIEST image of Ewing that I have ever seen. Please review scan of the item for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
